Source.Name: font-weather-icons
Source.Summary: Icon font with 222 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome (opentype)
Source.Description: Weather Icons is the only icon font with 222 weather themed icons, ready to be dropped right into any project that needs high quality weather, maritime, and meteorological based icons!

Package.Name: font-weather-icons-otf
Package.Summary: Icon font with 222 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome (opentype)
Package.Description: Weather Icons is the only icon font with 222 weather themed icons, ready to be dropped right into any project that needs high quality weather, maritime, and meteorological based icons!

Package.Summary: Icon font with 222 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome (truetype)
Package.Description: Weather Icons is the only icon font with 222 weather themed icons, ready to be dropped right into any project that needs high quality weather, maritime, and meteorological based icons!
